name: Traveler
message: Hey kid I need my money back... you shouldn't take other people's things

name: Ragged child
message: Yeah? well you know... I need it more than you

name: Option
message: What happened to this kid? He seems... broken, I must be careful with what I say next

name: Ragged child
message: You understand?? don't make me laugh, you don't know anything about me, about what've done

name: Traveler
message: You're right, I don't know you and yet I can see how broken you are

name: Traveler
message: I can see you've been through a lot, I haven't seen a lot of this place but it doesn't look like a place for kids

name: Traveler
message: Maybe I can help you, if you explain me what happened to you

name: Ragged child
message: You can't, you are not like us, I can tell... you don't understand our situation, ¡¡nobody does!!

name: Option
message: This is going over my control... What should I do?

name: Ragged child
message: You don't understand our situation, ¡¡nobody does!!

name: Option
message: This is going over my control... What should I do?
